\section{Module Operations.DotDataFunctions.datavstack}

    \label{Operations:DotDataFunctions:datavstack}
"Vertical stacking" of DotDatas, e.g. adding rows.

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}

    problems of numpy.v\_stack
